page.title: 03OCCUPATIONS
page.content: A survey of parents' occupations showed the following:- FEMALES Housewives 48, Clerical work 19, Teachers 15, Shop work 9, Nurses 7 ,Barstaff 5, Cleaners 4, Cooks 4, Salesperson 3, Demonstrators 2, Librarians 2 and 1 Hairdresser, Appliance maker, Manageress, Milk woman, Vet, Brewery worker. MALES Engineers 20, Managers 19, Salesmen 15, Teachers 8, Unemployed 5, Clerical work 9, Miners 5, Electrician 5, Joiner 4, Builder 3, Draughtsman 2, Surveyor 2, Council worker 2, Health worker 2 and 1 of Doctor, Dentist, Shopkeeper, Publican, Fireman, Policeman, Storeman, Industrial Photographer, Coach operator, Rail engineer, Chemical technician, Haulage contractor, Carpet maker, Public relations, Planning officer, Intelligist.
